content.raw:
I try do clone ignition-common and build on my system (Archlinux x64)
The following error showed

```
#!


[ 49%] Linking CXX executable UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST
cd /home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
/usr/bin/c++    -g -O2  -fvisibility=hidden  -g -O2     CMakeFiles/UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.dir/SVGLoader_TEST.cc.o  -o UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST  -L/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/test  -L/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src -Wl,-rpath,/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/test:/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src:/usr/local/lib64 -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lgtest_main -lgtest -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread libignition-common0.so.0.1.0 /usr/local/lib64/libignition-math3.so.3.0.0 -lfreeimage -lgts -lgthread-2.0 -lgmodule-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -luuid -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lrt 
libignition-common0.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `avdevice_register_all'
libignition-common0.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `av_output_video_device_next'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```


I had to reorder "-lavformat -lavutil" before "-lfreeimage" for the compilation to work. I still don't know how to fix it through CMakefile.txt

I hope there is someone who can help me out.
content.html:
I try do clone ignition-common and build on my system (Archlinux x64) The following error showed

[ 49%] Linking CXX executable UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST
cd /home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
/usr/bin/c++    -g -O2  -fvisibility=hidden  -g -O2     CMakeFiles/UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.dir/SVGLoader_TEST.cc.o  -o UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST  -L/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/test  -L/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src -Wl,-rpath,/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/test:/home/edhoari/Downloads/test/ign-common/build/src:/usr/local/lib64 -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lgtest_main -lgtest -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread libignition-common0.so.0.1.0 /usr/local/lib64/libignition-math3.so.3.0.0 -lfreeimage -lgts -lgthread-2.0 -lgmodule-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -luuid -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lrt 
libignition-common0.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `avdevice_register_all'
libignition-common0.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `av_output_video_device_next'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

I had to reorder "-lavformat -lavutil" before "-lfreeimage" for the compilation to work. I still don't know how to fix it through CMakefile.txt

I hope there is someone who can help me out.
